snippet: Political dark horses and ruling-party defectors have run up a string of electoral victories lately, exposing weaknesses in Vladimir V. Putin’s near monopoly on power.
abstract: Scattered political insurgencies against local governments in Russia have begun to expose cracks in Prime Min Vladimir V Putin's hold on power, just weeks before he again assumes the presidency.
lead_paragraph: Political dark horses and ruling-party defectors have run up a string of electoral victories lately, exposing weaknesses in Vladimir V. Putin’s near monopoly on power.

headline.seo: Russian Ruling Party Loses Mayoral Seat in Yaroslavl
headline.main: Mayoral Elections Give Russian Opposition a Boost
headline.print_headline: Mayoral Votes Give Russia Opposition a Boost
